tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EducationData(
  researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  research_topic VARCHAR(255),
  institution VARCHAR(255),
  publication_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE education_data (
    student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_name VARCHAR(50),
    grade_level INT,
    subject VARCHAR(50),
    test_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE program_evaluation (
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(50),
    program_type VARCHAR(50),
    evaluation_date DATE,
    effectiveness_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE education_programs (
  program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name VARCHAR(50),
  program_description TEXT,
  program_start_date DATE,
  program_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE students (
  student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_name VARCHAR(50),
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  grade_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE program_participation (
  participation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_id INT,
  student_id INT,
  participation_date DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY (program_id, student_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES education_programs(program_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES students(student_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EducationMetrics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name VARCHAR,
  program_name VARCHAR,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
  project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  researcher_id UUID REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE education_programs (
  program_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name TEXT,
  description TEXT,
  start_year INT,
  end_year INT
);
